text.title: Suspected plane debris washes ashore on several Maldives islands
text.head: Suspected plane debris washes ashore on several Maldives islands
Sources

list.item: Ali Naafiz. "More sightings of suspected plane debris reported across Maldives" — Haveeru Daily , August 8, 2015
""Airline debris" washed up in Maldives" — Raajjé Online , August 7, 2015
"A team from Police has gone to Banyan Tree resort to investigate the suspected plane debris found on the island" — SunOnline , August 7, 2015
Deborah Dupré. "MH370 Suspected Debris Strangely Being Secretly Disappeared (Photos)" — Before It's News , August 7, 2015
Mohamed Visham. "Maldives Police probe plane debris claims" — Haveeru Daily , August 7, 2015
"Possible wing part of MH370 found on Vabbinfaru Island Maldives" — Maldivesfinest , August 7, 2015
Sara C. Nelson. "MH370: Maldives Islanders Insist They Witnessed 'Low Flying' Missing Malaysia Airlines Flight" — The Huffington Post , April 4, 2015
Jason Koutsoukis. "Missing Malaysia Airlines plane: Maldives discounted as possible location for MH370" — The Sydney Morning Herald , March 19, 2014
